function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of sufficient understanding to design a high-quality community","Impact":"Potential for inadequate community planning leading to inefficient space use and increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive studies on community planning with a focus on disease transmission, engage public health experts, and integrate public health data into planning processes","Technologies":"Spatial analysis software, public health data integration tools","People":"Urban planners, community residents","Owner":"Urban planning departments, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate fairness, accessibility, and optimization of supply allocation","Impact":"Inequitable distribution of resources leading to potential health disparities and increased risk of disease spread","Mitigation":"Implement fair and accessible resource allocation strategies, conduct equity assessments, and engage community stakeholders in the decision-making process","Technologies":"Spatial analysis tools, equity assessment software","People":"Community residents, marginalized populations","Owner":"Local government, community organizations"},{"Description":"Use of multisource data, ArcGIS, and UNA for community planning","Impact":"Potential for inaccurate or incomplete data leading to suboptimal planning and increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Regular data validation and verification, integration of public health data sources, and collaboration with public health experts","Technologies":"Data validation tools, public health data integration platforms","People":"Urban planners, data analysts","Owner":"Urban planning departments, public health organizations"}]}
